Articles.Content: Hey all, pretty simple question: can you rename save files? Is it as easy as renaming the folder inside /saves/ or will I break something?

The 4th line of the persistent.sfs file is the title of the save:

GAME

{

version = 0.21.1

Title = default (Sandbox) <----

Description = No description available.

Mode = 0

Status = 1

scene = 5

flag = Squad/Flags/default

I'm pretty sure changing that works but the folder name is just for the sake of convenience when looking in the directory to find stuff.
